tool_description: This API helps to query for properties for rent, sale in UK to create a real estate site/application such as zoopla.com
name: Zoopla_v2
title: Zoopla

api_list.name: properties/list
api_list.description: List properties for sale or rent with options and filters

required_parameters.name: area
required_parameters.description:
The value of suggestions/value json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with listings as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value  returned by the endpoint. 
*'listing_id'  OR 'area' parameter must be provided to get this endpoint working.

optional_parameters.name: listing_id
optional_parameters.description:
The value of listing_id field returned right in this endpoint. 
*'listing_id'  OR 'area' parameter must be provided to get this endpoint working.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius (miles) to look for properties (1 - 40)

optional_parameters.name: listing_status
optional_parameters.description: One of the following sale | rent

optional_parameters.name: include_retirement_homes
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: minimum_beds
optional_parameters.description: Min number of bed rooms (1 - 10)

optional_parameters.name: include_shared_ownership
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: maximum_beds
optional_parameters.description: Max number of bed rooms (1 - 10)

optional_parameters.name: maximum_price
optional_parameters.description: Maximum sale or rent price

optional_parameters.name: include_sold
optional_parameters.description: One of the following 1 | 0

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: One of the following age|price|price_change|view_count

optional_parameters.name: include_rented
optional_parameters.description: One of the following 1 | 0

optional_parameters.name: identifier
optional_parameters.description: The value of suggestions/identifier json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with listings as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value returned by the endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: One of the following residential|commercial

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and separated by comma for multiple values : flats|farms_land|terraced|semi_detached|detached|bungalow|park_home|offices|retail|industrial|hospitality|land

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: One of the following ascending|descending

optional_parameters.name: new_homes
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: floor_area_max
optional_parameters.description: Maximum floor area, only use with commercial category.

optional_parameters.name: floor_area_min
optional_parameters.description: Minimum floor area, only use with commercial category.

optional_parameters.name: step_back_used
optional_parameters.description: One of the following 1 | 0

optional_parameters.name: bills_included
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: include_featured_properties
optional_parameters.description: One of the following 1 | 0

optional_parameters.name: created_since
optional_parameters.description: The date time from which properties added. The format must be yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, Ex : 2020-09-16 15:00:00

optional_parameters.name: pets_allowed
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: include_shared_accommodation
optional_parameters.description: One of the following yes | no

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: floor_area_units
optional_parameters.description: One of the following sq_feet|sq_metres

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 40)

optional_parameters.name: furnished
optional_parameters.description: One of the following furnished|part_furnished|unfurnished

optional_parameters.name: minimum_price
optional_parameters.description: Minimum sale or rent price

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: Any word or term, ex : garden,wooden floors

optional_parameters.name: price_frequency
optional_parameters.description: One of the following per_month|per_year

api_list.name: house-prices/get-area-stats

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The value of property_id field returned in .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/get-historic-listings

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The value of property_id field returned in .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/get-points-of-interest

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The value of property_id field returned in .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/estimate
api_list.description: Returned list of estimated house prices

required_parameters.name: area
required_parameters.description: The value of suggestions/value json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value  returned by the endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following detached|flat|terraced|semi_detached

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: One of the following price_paid|last_sold|address|estimated_value

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 40)

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: One of the following ascending|descending

optional_parameters.name: identifier
optional_parameters.description: The value of suggestions/identifier json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value returned by the endpoint.

api_list.name: properties/get-broadband

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: The value of listing_id field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

api_list.name: properties/get-running-costs

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: The value of listing_id field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: One of the following residential|commercial

optional_parameters.name: section
optional_parameters.description: One of the following for-sale|to-rent

api_list.name: properties/get-area-stats

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: The value of listing_id field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

api_list.name: properties/get-nearby

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: The value of listing_id field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestion by term or phrase

optional_parameters.name: search_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following properties|listings. Use  listings value to get suggestion for .../properties/list endpoint. Use properties value to get suggestion for .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/get-sales-history

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The value of property_id field returned in .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/get-running-costs

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The value of property_id field returned in .../house-prices/estimate endpoint.

api_list.name: house-prices/get-market-activity
api_list.description: Get market activity in an area

required_parameters.name: area
required_parameters.description: The value of suggestions/value json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value  returned by the endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: identifier
optional_parameters.description: The value of suggestions/identifier json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value returned by the endpoint.
